name: PositionOptions.timeout
description: The PositionOptions.timeout property is a positive long value representing the maximum length of time (in milliseconds) the device is allowed to take in order to return a position. The default value is Infinity, meaning that getCurrentPosition() won't return until the position is available.

refs.name: Geolocation API
refs.description: The definition of 'PositionOptions.timeout' in the 'Geolocation API' specification.
